text: Michael Joseph Pennington (born 5 September 1970), known as Johnny Vegas, is an English actor and comedian. He is known for his Lancashire accent, his angry rants, surreal humour, portly figure and high husky voice He became famous for his role as Geoff Maltby aka "The Oracle" in the ITV sitcom Benidorm (2007–2009, 2015–2017). His style comedy include: and support of St Helens rugby league club. == Life == Vegas was born in St Helens, Lancashire, England. He was married to Catherine "Kitty" Donnelly from 2002 until they divorced in 2008. He married Irish columnist Maia Dunphy in 2011 in Seville, Spain. He is a Christian, having returned to religion after having lapsed during adolescence.BBC One, The One Show, 17 December 2012. Interview with Nicky Gumbel and Johnny Vegas He continues to live in his home town of St Helens, and has been outspoken about the pride he takes in it; he is well known for being active in supporting the local community. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:British socialists Category:English Christians Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:Comedians from Lancashire Category:Entertainers from Merseyside
title: Johnny Vegas
